name: Pressure Cooker Balsamic Beef Stew
author: unknown
ingredients:
- 800g stewing beef
- 1 onion
- 3 carrots
- 1 red pepper
- 2 cloves garlic
- 60ml (1/4 cup) balsamic vinegar
- 2 tbsp brown sugar
- 200g mushrooms
- 250ml stock
- 3 tbsp tomato puree
- dried thyme and parsley
- 1 tbsp corn starch
- salt and pepper
instructions:
- Set to saute mode and brown the beef, then set aside.
- Fry off the onion, carrot and garlic for a few minutes.
- Add a little water to deglaze the pan and add in all the other ingredients except for the corn starch.
- Cook on high pressure for 20 minutes, natural release.
- When it is finished, set it to saute mode. Mix the corn starch with a little water, and stir in until the stew thickens.
